text: allh yatawalaa almuminin binasrih wtwfyqh whfzh, yukhrijuhum min zulumat alkfr, 'iilaa nur al'iyman. waladhin kafaruu ansarhm wawlyawhm alandad walawthan aladhin yebdwnhm min dun allh, yukhrjwnhm min nur al'iiman 'iilaa zulumat alkfr, 'uwlayik 'ashab alnaar almlazmwn lha, hum fiha baqwn baqa' abdyana la yukhrajun mnha
